title: Nerf Brand
body:
This champion is obscenely overpowered yet people won't even realize it!

Let's dissect his kit, shall we?

Passive: It's basically a free ignite... ON ALL ABILITIES {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} 

Q: A skillshot that can stun with his already ignite passive... Holy crap so basically it a free stun that's almost unmissable if you use your other abilities already on the opponent which is izi pz

W: AoE damage nuke, this should be an ultimate atleast because it do way too much damage for how safe it makes brand and it applies his passive so more ignite

E: Even more AoE if done correctly, completely overpowered and can destroy a whole team in seconds with this ability alone with w. not even a skillshot

R: Rofl this thing is so broken, if you throw it between two people it insta kills them both no counterplay involved. if there's a team they all pretty much have 10%hp instantly

O hur hur he got nerfed? he has mana problems??? 10+ mana on w op.

But muh lack of mobility...  and laugh at assassins whilet hey can't hurt you cuz braindead stun and you insta 1 shot kill them. Or better yet {{item:3157}} 

TL;DR nerf the freelo arsonist
